message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $60?

Hi Bob, I understand you're on a tight budget, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $60. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still trying to save some money. Can you meet me at $75?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $75. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer to you. I'll sell it to you for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
